Package repository

Class AbstractFileRepository<ID,E extends Entity<ID>>

java.lang.Object
repository.InMemoryRepository<ID,E>
repository.AbstractFileRepository<ID,E>
Type Parameters:
ID - - the type of the entity's ID
E - - the type of the entity that extends `Entity`
All Implemented Interfaces:
Repository<ID,E>
Direct Known Subclasses:
UserFileRepository
public abstract class AbstractFileRepository<ID,E extends Entity<ID>> extends InMemoryRepository<ID,E>
Abstract repository implementation for managing entities stored in a file. Extends the `InMemoryRepository` and adds functionality for file I/O operations.

  • Constructor Details

    • AbstractFileRepository

      public AbstractFileRepository(String filename, Validator<E> validator)
      Constructor that initializes the repository with a file and a validator. It loads the data from the file into memory.
      Parameters:
      filename - - the name of the file used for storing entities
      validator - - the validator for validating the entities

  • Method Details

    • extractEntity

      public abstract E extractEntity(List<String> attributes)
      Abstract method to be implemented by subclasses for extracting an entity from a list of attributes. Each subclass will define how to interpret the data based on the entity type.
      Parameters:
      attributes - - list of attributes extracted from the file
      Returns:
      E - the entity created from the attributes

    • createEntityAsString

      protected abstract String createEntityAsString(E entity)
      Abstract method to be implemented by subclasses for converting an entity into a string format. This string will be used for writing the entity back to the file.
      Parameters:
      entity - - the entity to be converted to string
      Returns:
      String - the string representation of the entity

    • save

      public E save(E entity)
      Saves an entity in memory and writes it to the file. If the entity is successfully saved in memory (i.e., it's new), it is also appended to the file.
      Specified by:
      save in interface Repository<ID,E extends Entity<ID>>
      Overrides:
      save in class InMemoryRepository<ID,E extends Entity<ID>>
      Parameters:
      entity - - the entity to be saved
      Returns:
      E - the entity if it already exists, null if it was saved successfully

    • writeToFile

      protected void writeToFile(E entity)
      Writes the given entity to the file by appending it.
      Parameters:
      entity - - the entity to be written to the file
